contentrichtext.text: '''[[Pensacola]]''' is a city in the western part of the U.S. state of Florida. '''Pensacola''' may also refer to: * [[Pensacola people]], a group of Native Americans * [[Pensacola culture]], an archaeological culture of the Mississippian period along the Gulf coast of the United States * A number of places in the Florida: ** [[Pensacola Bay]] ** [[Pensacola Regional Airport]] ** ''[[Pensacola News Journal]]'' ** [[Pensacola Christian College]] ** '''Pensacola Power''', a Women's football team now known as the [[Gulf Coast Riptide]] ** [[Pensacola Ice Pilots]], a minor league ice hockey team ** [[Pensacola Pelicans]], a minor league baseball team ** [[Pensacola High School]] ** [[Pensacola Civic Center]] ** [[Historic Pensacola Village]] **[[West Pensacola, Florida]] **[[Pensacola Beach, Florida]] **[[Naval Air Station Pensacola]], a U.S. Navy base ***The [[National Museum of Naval Aviation]] on NAS Pensacola * [[Pensacola, Oklahoma]] ** [[Pensacola Dam]] near the aforementioned town * [[USS Pensacola (CA-24)|USS ''Pensacola'' (CA-24)]], a U.S. Navy heavy cruiser, the lead ship of her class of heavy cruiser * [[Pensacola class cruiser|''Pensacola''-class cruiser]], a class of U.S. Navy cruisers * [[Pensacola (genus)]], a genus of jumping spiders * The name of a song from: ** ''[[Relish (album)|Relish]]'', Joan Osborne's 1995 album ** ''[[El Oso]]'', Soul Coughing's 1998 album * ''[[Pensacola: Wings of Gold]]'', a television series *[[Battle of Pensacola (1781)]], a naval battle {{disambig}}
